sentences.en: A rather cold n . w . airstream will cover our province.
sentences.cn: 一股偏冷的西北气流将控制我省.

sentences.en: A rather cold north west airstream will cover our province.
sentences.cn: 一股偏冷的西北气流将覆盖我省.

sentences.en: A westward moving airstream will, therefore, move equatorwards as it passes over the barrier.
sentences.cn: 因此,向西流动的气流在通过壁垒时, 将向赤道方向运动.

sentences.en: An active southerly airstream is bringing rainy weather to the south China coastal areas.
sentences.cn: 积极偏南气流带来的雨的天气华南沿岸地区.

sentences.en: MAYSAK will move south within a northerly airstream in the next 12 hours.
sentences.cn: 美莎克将受低层偏北气流影响而向南移动.

sentences.en: Noise will probably not hurt the airstream.
sentences.cn: 噪音基本上不会影响气流.

sentences.en: Rodney's house is like an Airstream trailer crossed with a coffee pot.
sentences.cn: 罗德尼的房子(外形)就象一辆缀有咖啡壶的蒸气拖车.

sentences.en: The fan adds energy to the airstream, increasing velocity.
sentences.cn: 而风扇的功用就是增加气流的动能, 增加推进速度.

sentences.en: The Growler is able to keep its weapons charged up and humming by lowering special turbines into the airstream that rushes past the plane when it is flying.
sentences.cn: 咆哮者可将特制的涡轮机降至飞机飞过时留下的气流里来实现对武器进行充电并使其重新进入活跃状态。

sentences.en: The Growler is able to keep its weapons charged up and humming by lowering special turbines into the airstream that rushes past the plane when it is flying.
sentences.cn: 咆哮者可以通过降低特殊涡轮转动将自身带入飞过的气流来保证电磁武器充电、运作。

sentences.en: The ramp sits at an acute angle to deflect the intake airstream from the longitudinal direction.
sentences.cn: 这个斜面锐角使进气口的气流纵向流变.

sentences.en: There are three types of airstream reaction engines.
sentences.cn: 空气喷气反作用式发动机有三种.

sentences.en: Thus high - energy cycle airstream to leave Qibeng.
sentences.cn: 因此循环气流以极高的能量离开气泵.

words.tran_cn: （尤指与飞机前进方向相反者）气流

trans.tran_cn: 气流（尤指与飞机前进方向相反者）
